name: Politz 2.0 - Modo Claro
description: Visual melhorado para o forum politz no modo claro
css: @-moz-document domain("forum.politz.com.br"){body{font-family:Roboto,serif;font-size:15px}.p-header{background:linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(41,52,98,1) 0,rgba(33,101,131,1) 35%,rgba(247,190,22,1) 100%)}.p-nav{box-shadow:none;background:#f7be16;color:#000;letter-spacing:.2px;box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22)}.p-nav li:hover{color:#eee}.p-navgroup-linkText:hover{color:#eee;animation:fadein .4s}.tabs-tab.is-active{color:#eee!important}.tabs-tab:hover{color:#eee!important}.p-body{background:#dedede}.button{color:#000!important;background:#f7be16!important}.button.button--link{color:#000!important}.button-text{color:#000!important}.button-text:hover{color:#fff!important;animation:fadein .5s}.xb-content-wrapper{background:#dedede}.structItem-title{font-size:16px;font-family:"Segoe UI","Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Roboto,Oxygen,Ubuntu,Cantarell,"Fira Sans","Droid Sans",sans-serif}.p-title-value{font-size:1.4rem;letter-spacing:.1px}.p-description{font-style:italic}.listInline--bullet{margin-top:10px}.avatar{border-radius:5%}.hScroller-action--end{background:#f7be16}.message-cell{margin:10px 10px}.structItem-cell--main:hover{background:#dedddd}.button.button--cta{border-color:#f7be16!important}.reactionsBar{width:100%;text-align:right;float:right;opacity:.8!important}.message-name{font-size:17px;letter-spacing:1.2px}.userTitle{font-weight:700;font-style:italic;font-size:13px;color:#d0a113;margin-top:2px;margin-bottom:8px}.message-cell.message-cell--user{background:#ececec}.message-cell--user{border-top:1px solid #f7be16}.message-threadStarter{background:#216583!important}.fr-submit{background:#f7be16!important;border-color:none;color:#000!important}.ah-gp-icons-container{text-align:center}.bbCodeBlock{border:1px dashed #f7be16}.p-footer--container{background:#dedede}.p-footer-default{margin-top:40px;background:#1f1f1f}.p-footer-custom{background:#1f1f1f}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes white{from{color:#fff}to{color:#fff}}
